__e: Did you know? A person can't posess another.

If you think you know me or you have some part of me because of the music... and then you think that I'm being controlled like a dog on a leash... because I do things with her... then screw you, brother, or sister.
I think you're wrong. There are some women that men would desire to have in their lives for that one solitary hour, and then die!
Finally, having searched all over the world... I have found a man with a strong spirit... and firm character, who, above all, has proven... to have the most important virtue known to mankind:
If you can't say something nice about somebody... now I need you to own the room.
If you knew how to fight, Joe, you coulda owned the town and everybody in it.
How'd you like to own a little bit of my foot in your ass ?
Which means you have to have a part of your mom in you.
He had this whole thing-- he was gonna name the horse "A Father's Love" 'cause you guys always wanted to have a horse together.
Yes, sir. The defense for all parties should be in possession of our evidence by the end of the day.
MMM, I THINK THIS GHOST JUST FIGURED OUT A WAY TO POSSESS PEOPLE FOR A FEW MINUTES, OR AT LEAST LONG ENOUGH TO GET THEM TO DO THE THINGS HE WANTS DONE.
For the two of us... what counts more than the possession of things-- how shall I put it?
What does a man profit, if he shall gain the whole world and lose his own soul?
I used to think you cast a spell to get my son's heart.
For I am the only one in possession of the new password.
I mean, he could...kill... possess people.
And I'm also a little horrified by the fact that you think people should just be allowed to own guns.
As I told you a long time ago... You are not the only one with gifts.
